title: Explanatory notes on nurses' pay Twitter graphic

content.text: On 10 November 2022, DHSC posted a tweet about nurses’ pay, after the Royal College of Nursing announced the result of its ballot on strike action. The tweet included a graphical representation of increases in nurses’ pay over the past three years.
The tweet received comments from online followers asking for more information on the figures used; the department is publishing this blog to provide this.
